name: The Sea Monster - Limited Edition of 10 Signed Giclee Print (01/10)
description:
An illustration taken from The Cruel & Curious Sea exhibition at Stowe Barton in September 2013.

This is a limited edition run of only 10 canvas prints. Each one is signed by me. The canvas measures 61cm wide by 40.5cm high

This a durable Polycotton canvas with a deep 3.8cm wooden frame that comes with wooden wedges to retain canvas tension.

The canvas has a white edge (the image does NOT wrap right around the sides).

name: The Jesus Storybook Bible - Signed Giclee Print
description: This is a professional Giclee print on 310 gsm Hahnemuhle German Etching paper, this is a heavyweight etching board with a fine silky smooth textured surface. You can choose the dimensions of the paper but the exact dimensions of the print will vary slightly as the illustrations are not all the same shape. All prints have a 10% border on all sides. The illustrations are taken from the best selling book by Sally Lloyd-Jones, for which I was the illustrator. You can order a print of any of the illustrations in the book, click this link to go to Flickr and during the PayPal checkout make a note of the page number you would like (29c for example). Flickr Portfolio *Please note that all prints can be signed by me if requested - please leave a note when ordering stating any inscription and where on the print you would like me to sign (bottom right corner, reverse side etc)*

name: The Jesus Storybook Bible - Signed Canvas Print
description: This a durable Polycotton canvas with a deep 3.8cm wooden frame that comes with wooden wedges to retain canvas tension.
